name: Freddy's Pizza Delivery (Fangame)
description:
Welcome to your new job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza! 

This restaurant is a full replica of the famous pizzeria from the 90s. Here we have delicious pizza, great atmosphere, and even the original Freddy Fazbear animatronics restored and almost working like new! But at our restaurant, we do something that no other Fazbear restaurant has ever done before:

We do delivery!

Yes, that's right! We bring the pizza to you, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week!

And that's where you come in, new employee!

It is your job to deliver the pizzas during the night! Sure, there are a few risks involved, but we'll get into that later!

Your shift starts at 11:30 PM! So get ready to quench those customer's late night pizza cravings!
